content.query:
CREATE TABLE stg.DimCity
	(
	 [CityKey] int,
	 [WWICityID] int,
	 [City] nvarchar(4000),
	 [StateProvince] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Country] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Continent] nvarchar(4000),
	 [SalesTerritory] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Region] nvarchar(4000),
	 [Subregion] nvarchar(4000),
	 [LatestRecordedPopulation] bigint,
	 [ValidFrom] datetime2(7),
	 [ValidTo] datetime2(7),
	 [LineageKey] int
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED INDEX([CityKey])
	);
GO

COPY INTO stg.DimCity
(CityKey 1, WWICityID 2, City 3, StateProvince 4, Country 5, Continent 6, SalesTerritory 7, Region 8, Subregion 9, LatestRecordedPopulation 10, ValidFrom 11, ValidTo 12, LineageKey 13)
FROM 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi/Dimension/Dimension.City.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
);
GO
